title: I Wear These Under $30 Amazon Bodysuits Constantly, and Almost Kept Them a Secret
description: I spend a lot of my free time online shopping, and one of the more surprising places I've found chic fashion items is Amazon. From designer shoes (yes, really) to workout clothes and affordable jewelry that could pass for luxury, I've found tons of stylish winners. Browsing the site can often feel overwhelming because there are so many great options, but luckily, I did the hard work for you and stumbled across four bodysuits that I absolutely fell in love with. When I received my bodysuits in the mail, I immediately decided to order a few more, because the quality was so good I couldn't believe how affordable they were. All of these bodysuits have a snap closure, which makes them super easy to get in and out of, and they all run true to size. To keep the pieces in the best shape possible, I typically wash them on delicate with like colors and hang them to dry. They've all held up great after numerous washes, which is an absolute must for me because I can occasionally be hard on my clothes. If you're on a budget or just looking to save a few bucks while adding some affordable pieces to your wardrobe, keep reading to check out my tried-and-true picks.
author: Renee Rodriguez
excerpt: One PS writer showcases four basic affordable Amazon bodysuits, all of which cost under $30. Check out her review and photos.
